open.title: Open Source
open.content: We uphold the spirit of open source, sharing knowledge and growing with the community.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: We embrace new technologies and pursue excellence in user experience.

education.title: Education First
education.content: We focus on educational scenarios and solve real problems.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Explore our open-source projects developed to enhance teaching experiences

SecRandom.description: An easy-to-use roll call/lottery software designed for educational scenarios to make classroom roll call more efficient and transparent!

SecScore.description: A simple, easy-to-use, elegant and beautiful class personal points management software.

team.title: Team
team.description: Meet the passionate students behind SECTL

about.title: About
about.description: Learn about SECTL's mission and vision

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: SECTL is an open-source team composed of passionate students. We are dedicated to developing innovative educational software that enhances the teaching experience and makes learning more efficient and enjoyable.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We believe technology can transform education. Through open-source collaboration, we hope to create a vibrant community that advances educational technology together, making quality teaching tools accessible to every student and teacher.

bulletin.title: Bulletin
bulletin.description: Latest updates, activities, and plans from the team
